features: Night Absorb Core: Super absorbent material to help keep your baby’s diaper dry all night with up to 12 hours of advanced protection. The absorbent material features plant-based materials that won’t irritate your baby’s skin
Gentle Comfort Liner: Ultra soft-touch liner made without fragrances to be gentle on baby's sensitive skin and protect against diaper rash
Honestly Secure Fit: Soft, stretchy side panels, comfy elastic waistband, sure-fit leg cuffs and fastening tabs - sweet dreams
Eco-Friendly Materials: Plant-based core with sustainably harvested fluff pulp and plant-derived materials
Made with hypoallergenic materials for the utmost in comfort; Plant-based inner and outer layers are gentle on baby's skin; Super sweet sheep print; Stretchy tabs for a perfect fit
body.description: We’ve got you covered with our overnight diapers that help protect your baby’s delicate skin with up to 12 hours of advanced wetness protection and odor control! No more leaky diaper dilemmas: our nighttime diapers are designed with a super-absorbent core that provides up to 12 hours of protection from moisture for a blissful night’s sleep. No more nighttime leaks: thanks to the extra absorbency of our Honest Diapers, your baby stays comfortable in their super soft diaper and you don't need to lose sleep over a diaper change!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Honestly Secure Fit features stretchy side panels, a comfy waistband, sure-fit leg cuffs, and fastening tabs for a perfectly-fitted diaper. The Night Absorb Core keeps your baby's diaper dry for cloudlike comfort with up to 12 hours of protection. We make our ultra soft-touch line without fragrances to be gentle on baby’s skin. Our absorbent core is made with plant-based responsibly sourced fluff pulp and other controlled materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very absorbent, no leaks so far, fit well. More expensive than what I usually pay for diapers but I’m only using one a day so I it’s worth it in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work for 12/hr nights.
reviews.reviewText: These absorb so well - been using them exclusively for little's bedtimes because they are a little pricier but SO worth it! They do seem to run a touch smaller than Huggies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great overnight diapers!
reviews.reviewText: We bought these diapers once my son started sleeping through the night. He wears these for about 12 hours of sleep and we've never had a leak! His bum is also pretty dry in the morning. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HONEST IS A GARBAGE COMPANY WITH A GARBAGE PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: HONEST IS A GARBAGE COMPANY WITH A GARBAGE PRODUCT Honest has garbage diapers and garbage customer service. The tabs rip off in defective packs (some are fine, some rip 100% of the pack) and Honest will only honor returns within 90 days and not sold by third parties (Target, amazon, etc). I thought I'd give them the benefit of the doubt and purchase directly from their website, and had this ISSUE HAPPEN AGAIN, and they refuse to honor an exchange past 90 days. They are such stiff diapers, the night times leak and honestly, it's not worth my time OR MONEY to keep purchasing from this garbage company. I'd rather let my credit go to waste then spend another single penny here. So disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love them super cute my daughter always loves the design on the outside of them and she knows they are only for nigh time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great absorbency, run small
reviews.reviewText: Our 2-year-old has had persistent diaper rash for many months, and after trying multiple different oral and topical treatments, and giving him time with his diaper off during the day whenever possible, the pediatrician said we need to change his diaper at night so he doesn't have a wet diaper on for 12 hours straight. The thought of disrupting everyone's sleep every night filled me with dread, so I thought let's try overnight diapers first and see if that helps....and it has! We've been using these for about a week and the diaper rash is much less irritated and inflamed looking. The diapers feel much drier in the morning compared to the Pampers Pure we use during the day. The fabric itself is a bit weird and stiff, not as soft as other diapers we've tried, but he hasn't asked to take them off or anything so they must feel fine to him.I didn't really pay attention to the reviews saying the diapers run small, because our son is about 28lbs. and he's 2, so he doesn't have the chunky baby thighs anymore, although he doesn't have skinny legs yet either. But he very comfortably fits into all other size 4 diapers without any issues. These however are SMALL. Like really small. The tabs barely make it over his hips to close the sides, and the diaper itself is narrow. I would think if your baby is over 30lbs. there's absolutely no way a size 4 would fit, even though it's supposed to go up to 37lbs....no way! If we order more of these we'll go with the next size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps baby comfortable!!!
reviews.reviewText: These are great. My baby has super sensitive skin and these don’t give him any rash. He is a heavy wetter so these keep him dry all night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hypoallergenic and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: These worked great for my very sensitive baby. I have used Huggies and other allegedly hypoallergenic diapers that still leave rashes. The Honest diapers have never left a rash. In addition, I found they hold more urine overnight without the diaper leaking or becoming damp with pee (this happened with the Pampers Pure). Very happy with these diapers.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best, if not the best!
reviews.reviewText: This one has the best absorbency and leak protection out of all the diaper brands I've tried, and the best of all, NO RASHES! The only issue is the high cost.

There’s a lot of junk in diapers, especially overnight diapers. These are decently clean, and genuinely keep my 16 month old dry for 11+ hours. They hold a lot and keep him comfortable all night. He has pretty sensitive skin as many babes do, and he’s never broken out or reacted to these. We switched to another brand to save some money and had to switch back to the Honest diapers within 2 weeks because the others were leaking and soaking his PJs every night / he was waking very early due to being uncomfortable. I recommend these to everyone!

I switched our daughter’s diapers to Honest because other clean brands overnight diapers could not hold the amount of pee that accumulates overnight and she would have wet pjs and sleep sack. Honest’s overnights hold everything! It’s been a few months of just using theirs and we’ve never had a leak.
Son los mejores pañales, súper absorbentes y diseños hermosos
